verses.roman:
doṅhā āliṅgiyā prabhu balila bhakta-gaṇe
sabe kṛpā kari' uddhāraha dui jane

synonyms: doṅhā—both of them; āliṅgiyā—embracing; prabhu—the Lord; balila—said; bhakta-gaṇe—unto the devotees; sabe—all of you; kṛpā—mercy; kari'-showing; uddhāraha—deliver; dui—the two; jane—persons.
translation: After this, the Lord embraced both of them and requested all of the devotees present to be merciful upon them and deliver them.
